title: MarkLogic Centers Nature Publishing Group Content
abstract: Over seven million people visit Nature.com every month on a wide variety of devices to read some of the most prestigious scientific journals and magazines including Nature and Scientific American as well as online databases and other services. Behind it all is the Nature Publishing Group Content Hub, which is creating a faster, easier user experience through a simplified architecture which revolves around MarkLogic. In this session, Howard Ratner, CTO/EVP of Nature Publishing Group, will explain how several business units rely on this program and what it is accomplishing for internal and external users as well as the business.

surveys.comments: 20 minute talk. Thin on specifics or insight. Like to have heard more about triple store.
